metadata.name: Dark Gravity
metadata.description: This city will spoil you, with its swirls of sights and sounds, an island dense with dark gravity, like the center of a spiraled galaxy. Eight million orbits intersecting, a push and pull, the people you pass and sometimes meet nudging you this way and that in your ever-changing trajectory, where the smallest shift will change your life forever. We’re bound by a common physics- but we’re governed by unique thresholds, our tensions varied, wound like so many springs. What foundation are you built on? What pulls YOU along your woven trail? Do you set off into each moment with your careful plan, or submit yourself to a beautiful buildup of chance and circumstance?
